mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eam_gateway_status ( gateway_id, lng, rng, longitudeLBS, latitudeLBS, longitudeGPS, latitudeGPS, wifiMac, baseStationInfo, electricQuantity, runningTime, signalIntensity, satellitesCount, speed, orientation, distancePrecision, uploadInterval, bluetoothInterval, bluetoothWhiteList, bluetoothWhiteListCount, receive_time) VALUES (#{gateway_id},#{lng},#{rng},#{longitudeLBS},#{latitudeLBS},#{longitudeGPS},#{latitudeGPS},#{wifiMac},#{baseStationInfo},#{electricQuantity},#{runningTime},#{signalIntensity},#{satellitesCount},#{speed},#{orientation},#{distancePrecision},#{uploadInterval},#{bluetoothInterval},#{bluetoothWhiteList},#{bluetoothWhiteListCount},#{receive_time})
mapper.select: select count(1) from eam_gateway_status where gateway_id = #{gateway_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE eam_gateway_status SET lng = #{lng}, rng = #{rng} , longitudeLBS = #{longitudeLBS}, latitudeLBS = #{latitudeLBS} , longitudeGPS = #{longitudeGPS} , latitudeGPS = #{latitudeGPS} , wifiMac = #{wifiMac} , baseStationInfo = #{baseStationInfo} , electricQuantity = #{electricQuantity} , runningTime = #{runningTime} , signalIntensity = #{signalIntensity} , satellitesCount = #{satellitesCount} , speed = #{speed} , orientation = #{orientation} , distancePrecision = #{distancePrecision} , uploadInterval = #{uploadInterval} , bluetoothInterval = #{bluetoothInterval} , bluetoothWhiteList = #{bluetoothWhiteList} , bluetoothWhiteListCount = #{bluetoothWhiteListCount} , receive_time = #{receive_time} WHERE gateway_id = #{gateway_id}
